p: Classically, alphaviruses are described in 2 groups—the “old world” viruses, including Sindbis, O'nyong'nyong, and Ross River viruses, which cause a predominantly arthritic syndrome, and the “new world” viruses, including Eastern, Western, and Venezuelan equine encephalitis viruses, which are responsible for outbreaks of encephalitis. 2 Chikungunya virus is now recognised as a cause of both arthritic and neurological diseases throughout the tropics.
